entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Snow level 1500 metres. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers after midnight. Snow level 1300 metres lowering to valley bottom after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023
